text: Alex Purver (born 1 December 1995) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Östersunds FK. ==Career== Purver started his career with his local team Leeds United where he captained the under-21 side. During the 2016–17 season, he had two loan spells with National League side Guiseley, before joining the club permanently in the summer of 2017. In July 2019, Purver signed an 18-month deal with Swedish side Östersunds FK, following a successful trial. On 21 July 2019, he made his debut for Östersund, playing the full match in a 3–0 loss to Norrköping in the Allsvenskan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Footballers from Leeds Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Leeds Category:Leeds United F.C. players Category:Guiseley A.F.C. players Category:Östersunds FK players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:National League (English football) players Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:English footballers
title: Alex Purver
